data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nappo, Andrea, Rey, Xabier, Pellegrini, Daniel, Bonomolo, Giuseppe, Crocetta, Fabio (2018): Revisiting the disjunct distribution of Conopleura Hinds, 1844 (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Drilliidae). Zootaxa 4392 (3): 567-587, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4392.3.7|11 occurrences
